AboutSection.title: About Us
AboutSection.subtitle: Specialized Company in FDA Solutions
AboutSection.description: We are a company specialized in providing comprehensive solutions for all requirements and licenses of the Saudi Food and Drug Authority. We have a professional team with extensive experience in handling regulatory and administrative procedures in the fields of food, pharmaceuticals, medical supplies and devices, and feed additives.
AboutSection.visionDesc: To be the first trusted partner for traders and product suppliers in the Saudi market, by providing comprehensive regulatory and consulting services that contribute to accelerating their steps and achieving their goals efficiently.
AboutSection.goalsDesc: Facilitate all types of procedures related to the Food and Drug Authority and support traders and small enterprises with comprehensive market studies.

We have a professional team with extensive experience in handling regulatory and administrative procedures in the fields of food, pharmaceuticals, medical supplies and devices, and feed additives. We work according to the highest standards of quality and commitment, and we are keen to facilitate tasks for our clients by providing flexible and fast services that keep pace with market developments, and support the growth of small and medium enterprises towards success and sustainability.

FAQSection.title: Frequently Asked
FAQSection.description: Answers to the most common questions about our services in the field of Food and Drug Authority

items.question: What services do you offer in the field of Food and Drug Authority?
items.answer: We offer a comprehensive range of services including: obtaining official licenses, listing products and factories, storage services compliant with requirements, warehouse setup, and specialized business consultations.

items.question: How long does it take to obtain a Food and Drug Authority license?
items.answer: The duration varies depending on the type of license and product, but usually ranges from 2-8 weeks. We work to speed up the process through our experience and good relations with the competent authorities.

items.question: Do you offer services for small and emerging companies?
items.answer: Yes, we specialize in supporting small, medium, and emerging companies. We offer flexible packages and competitive prices that suit their needs and budgets.

items.question: What is the cost of your services?
items.answer: The cost depends on the type of service required and the size of the project. We offer a free initial consultation to assess your needs and provide a detailed and appropriate quote.

items.question: Do you guarantee obtaining licenses?
items.answer: Yes, we have a very high success rate in obtaining licenses thanks to our long experience and deep understanding of the requirements of the Food and Drug Authority. We guarantee follow-up until the license is obtained.

items.question: Do you provide services in all regions of the Kingdom?
items.answer: Yes, we provide our services throughout the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. We have a wide network of partnerships and offices that enable us to serve our clients in all regions.

items.question: How can I start obtaining your services?
items.answer: You can contact us by phone, email, or visit our offices. We will schedule a free consultation to assess your needs and develop an appropriate action plan.

items.question: Do you provide support after obtaining licenses?
items.answer: Of course, we provide continuous support even after obtaining licenses. This includes periodic follow-up, renewals, and assistance with any required updates or changes.
